original_text: That is what I was doing in Jerusalem. The leaders of the priests gave me authority to put many of the believers in prison. I agreed with our leaders when they said, “These people must die.”
korean_text: 예루살렘에서 이런 일을 행하여 대제사장들에게서 권한을 받아 가지고 많은 성도를 옥에 가두며 또 죽일 때에 내가 찬성 투표를 하였고

sentences.original_text: That is what I was doing in Jerusalem.
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 내가 예루살렘에서 하고 있던 일이었습니다.

sentences.original_text: The leaders of the priests gave me authority
to put many of the believers in prison.
sentences.korean_translation: 많은 믿는 사람들을 감옥에 가두게 했습니다.
